entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:49 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 03:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Temperature: -17.3°C
Pressure: 102.5 kPa
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: -20.9°C
Wind: E 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:23 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:23 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 8:23 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
